name: Ride to the heaven
description:
The player has to control the movement of the car through items of the environment for finding the goal. The goal is in the top of the environment by the moment.

There was a bug and is fixed in this version:

https://drive.google.com/drive/folders/1yWjwtRL9ZpGNtH8vI9z6FTIoxpzrFaI_?usp=sha...
